context_bundle.summary: Cargo not recognized in multiplexor sessions. Fixed by adding C:\Users\Stryker_LOCAL\.cargo\bin to Machine PATH. Requires Claude Desktop restart for multiplexor to inherit new environment.

onboarding.quick_start: Machine PATH updated 2025-12-30. If cargo stops working: 1) Verify Machine PATH contains cargo\bin, 2) Restart Claude Desktop to refresh multiplexor environment. PowerShell profile also set but multiplexor uses -NoProfile so it doesn't help.
known_errors: multiplexor spawns with -NoProfile so PS profile PATH additions don't work
multiplexor caches parent environment at startup
User PATH works in normal terminals but not multiplexor sessions
